Second Workshop on Bangla Language Processing

Recent Updates


  • Aug 13, 2025: Pre-submission Mentoring is launched.
  • Jul 20, 2025: Two Shared Tasks are announced.
  • June 19, 2025: Website is up!
  • June 19, 2025: Join the Slack channel for communication.

Important Dates

* These dates are approximate date based on IJCNLP-AACL 2025 and are subject to changes.

Paper submission due Oct 4 (Sat), 2025
Notification of acceptance Nov 3 (Mon), 2025
Camera-ready due Nov 11 (Tue), 2025
Workshop December 2025 co-located with IJCNLP-AACL

Best Paper Awards

Regular Papers

1. BSpell: A CNN-Blended BERT Based Bangla Spell Checker
Chowdhury Rafeed Rahman, MD.Hasibur Rahman, Samiha Zakir, Mohammad Rafsan, Mohammed Eunus Ali

2. Low-Resource Text Style Transfer for Bangla: Data & Models
Sourabrata Mukherjee, Akanksha Bansal, Pritha Majumdar, Atul Kr Ojha, Ondrej Dusek

3. Offensive Language Identification in Transliterated and Code-Mixed Bangla
Md Nishat Raihan, Umma Hani Tanmoy, Anika Binte Islam, Kai North, Tharindu Ranasinghe, Antonios Anastasopoulos, Marcos Zampieri

All Regular Workshop Papers
